mapper.sql: order_id,wxuser_id,saler_id,postil,order_no ,pay_status,group_id,group_leader_name ,group_leader_phone,group_leader_icon ,buyer_name, buyer_phone, buyer_address, pickup_location, total_fee, discounts_fee,transportation_fee ,pay_fee ,pay_order_id ,pay_channel, create_time, pay_time,close_time, form_id,appmodel_id,user_desc,after_sale_order_id,user_after_sale_num

order_id,wxuser_id,saler_id,postil,order_no ,pay_status ,buyer_name, buyer_phone, buyer_address,pickup_location, total_fee, discounts_fee,transportation_fee ,pay_fee ,pay_order_id ,pay_channel, create_time, pay_time,close_time,appmodel_id order_detail_id,order_detail_no,goods_id,goods_price,goods_name,preferential, goods_img,update_time,send_time,record_time,user_desc, group_id,group_leader_name ,group_leader_phone,group_leader_icon, shop_desc,line_id,activity_id,form_id,line_name,goods_num,goods_detail, forecast_receive_time,after_sale_order_id,user_after_sale_num
mapper.update:
update t_order
set pay_status = 2
set shop_desc = #{shopDesc}
set pay_status = 7
set delete_flag = true
where order_id in
#{item}
and pay_status = 1
update t_order set delete_flag = 1 where wxuser_id = #{wxuserId} and order_no = #{orderNo} and pay_status in (5,6)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_order AS o LEFT JOIN t_order_detail AS od ON od.`order_id`=o.`order_id` left join t_activity_goods as actg on od.act_goods_id = actg.activity_goods_id WHERE o.delete_flag =0 and o.order_id =#{orderId}

SELECT
FROM t_order where appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} and delete_flag =0 and group_id = #{groupLeaderId}
and pay_status in(3,4)
and pay_status in(1,2)
order by create_time desc
select * from t_order where appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} and delete_flag =0
select * from t_order where create_time and delete_flag =0

SELECT o.*, wxuser.wxuser_name as user_name, wxuser.icon as user_icon, cmt.goods_score as goods_score,cmt.comment_content_goods, od.order_detail_id,od.order_detail_no,od.record_time,od.send_time, od.line_id,od.activity_id,od.preferential,od.goods_name, od.goods_num,od.goods_price,od.goods_id, od.goods_img,od.goods_detail, act.forecast_receive_time,od.act_goods_id,od.preferential, line.line_name FROM t_order AS o LEFT JOIN t_order_detail AS od ON od.`order_id`=o.`order_id` left join t_activity as act on od.activity_id = act.activity_id left join t_wxuser as wxuser on wxuser.wxuser_id = o.wxuser_id left join t_comment as cmt on cmt.order_no = o.order_no left join t_line as line on line.line_id = od.line_id WHERE o.delete_flag = 0
and o.`wxuser_id`=#{wxuserId}
and o.pay_status in (1,2) order by od.send_time desc
and o.pay_status in (5,6) order by cmt.comment_time desc
and o.pay_status = #{orderStatus} order by od.record_time desc
order by o.create_time desc

select DISTINCT o.*, od.order_detail_id,od.order_type,od.act_goods_id,od.goods_id,od.goods_price,od.goods_detail,od.group_leader_commission, od.preferential,od.goods_name,od.goods_img,od.update_time,od.activity_id,od.send_time,od.record_time,od.line_id, od.street_id,od.goods_num,l.line_name from t_order as o left join t_order_detail as od on od.order_id = o.order_id left join t_line as l on l.line_id = od.line_id where o.delete_flag = 0 and pay_status in(1,2,3,4) and od.activity_id = #{activityId}
select pay_status as payStatu, count(pay_status) as payStatusSum from t_order WHERE appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} and pay_status in (0,1,2,3,4) group by pay_status order by pay_status asc

select DISTINCT o.*, wu.wxuser_name as user_name, wu.icon as user_icon, od.order_detail_id,od.order_type,od.act_goods_id,od.goods_id,od.goods_price,od.goods_detail,od.group_leader_commission, od.preferential,od.goods_name,od.goods_img,od.update_time,od.activity_id,od.send_time,od.record_time,od.line_id, od.street_id,od.goods_num,l.line_name, cmt.goods_score as goods_score,cmt.comment_content_goods from t_order as o left join t_order_detail as od on od.order_id = o.order_id left join t_line as l on l.line_id = od.line_id left join t_comment as cmt on cmt.order_no = o.order_no left join t_wxuser as wu on wu.wxuser_id = o.wxuser_id where o.order_id in
#{orderId}

select * from t_order as o left join t_order_detail as od on o.order_id = od.order_id left join t_after_sale_order as aso on aso.after_sale_order_id = o.after_sale_order_id where o.order_id in
#{orderId}

select * from t_order as o left join t_wxuser as wu on o.wxuser_id = wu.wxuser_id left join t_order_detail as od on od.order_id = o.order_id left join t_line as l on l.line_id = od.line_id left join t_community as c on c.community_id = wu.community_id where o.delete_flag =0 and o.order_id in
#{orderId}

select * from t_order where pay_status=0 and delete_flag = 0 and order_id in
#{item}
select * from t_order where pay_status in (5,6) and appmodel_id = #{appmodelId}

select * from t_order_detail as od join t_order as o on o.order_id = od.order_id where o.order_no in
#{item}

select o.order_id,o.wxuser_id,o.order_no,o.pay_status,o.buyer_name,o.buyer_phone,o.buyer_address,o.pickup_location,o.total_fee, o.discounts_fee,o.pay_fee, o.user_desc,o.shop_desc,o.pay_channel,o.create_time,o.pay_time, o.group_id,o.group_leader_phone,o.group_leader_name,o.group_leader_icon,o.postil,o.appmodel_id, w.wxuser_Name,w.icon, c.goods_score, c.group_score, c.comment_content_goods,c.comment_content_group, od.goods_name, od.goods_id, od.goods_img, od.goods_price, od.preferential,od.goods_num,od.update_time,od.send_time,od.record_time, l.line_name, sb.send_bill_id,sb.send_bill_name,sb.create_date,sb.status,ag.activity_price from t_order as o left join t_order_detail as od on o.order_id = od.order_id left join t_line as l on l.line_id = od.line_id left join t_comment as c on c.order_no = o.order_no left join t_wxuser as w on w.wxuser_id =o.wxuser_id left join t_order_send_bill_mapping as om on om.order_id = o.order_id left join t_send_bill as sb on sb.send_bill_id = om.send_bill_id left join t_activity_goods as ag on ag.activity_goods_id = od.act_goods_id where o.delete_flag = 0 and o.order_id in
#{item}
select * from t_order where delete_flag = 0 and after_sale_order_id = #{afterSaleOrderId}

select * from t_order where delete_flag = 0 and group_id = #{groupLeaderId} and pay_status not in (0,5,6,7) and order_type != 11
and create_time > #{startDate} and create_time <= #{endDate}

SELECT o.* FROM t_order AS o LEFT JOIN t_after_sale_order AS a ON o.after_sale_order_id = a.after_sale_order_id WHERE (o.after_sale_order_id is null or (a.after_sale_status = 1 OR a.after_sale_status = 2 OR a.after_sale_status = 7 OR a.after_sale_status = 99 ) ) AND o.pay_status = 2 AND o.order_id IN
#{item}
select o.* from t_order as o where o.group_id = #{groupLeaderId} and o.pay_status=#{type}
select * from t_order as o left join t_order_detail as od on o.order_id = od.order_id where o.group_id = #{groupLeaderId} and o.pay_status in (1,2,3,8,9)

select o.order_id,o.wxuser_id,o.order_no,o.pay_status,o.buyer_name,o.buyer_phone,o.buyer_address,o.pickup_location,o.total_fee, o.discounts_fee,o.pay_fee, o.user_desc,o.shop_desc,o.pay_channel,o.create_time,o.pay_time, o.group_id,o.group_leader_phone,o.group_leader_name,o.group_leader_icon,o.postil,o.appmodel_id, w.wxuser_Name,w.icon, c.goods_score, c.group_score, c.comment_content_goods,c.comment_content_group, od.goods_name, od.goods_id, od.goods_img, od.goods_price, od.preferential,od.goods_num,od.update_time,od.send_time,od.record_time, o.after_sale_order_id,o.user_after_sale_num, l.line_name, sb.send_bill_id,sb.send_bill_name,sb.create_date,sb.status,ag.activity_price from t_order as o left join t_after_sale_order as aso on aso.after_sale_order_id = o.after_sale_order_id left join t_order_detail as od on o.order_id = od.order_id left join t_line as l on l.line_id = od.line_id left join t_comment as c on c.order_no = o.order_no left join t_wxuser as w on w.wxuser_id =o.wxuser_id left join t_order_send_bill_mapping as om on om.order_id = o.order_id left join t_send_bill as sb on sb.send_bill_id = om.send_bill_id left join t_activity_goods as ag on ag.activity_goods_id = od.act_goods_id where o.delete_flag = 0 and o.appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} and o.order_id in
#{item}

select wxuser_id,buyer_name,buyer_phone,buyer_address from t_order where order_id in
#{item}
select * from t_order where pay_status= 0 and pay_order_id is not null;

SELECT o.order_id FROM t_order AS o LEFT JOIN t_after_sale_order AS a ON o.after_sale_order_id = a.after_sale_order_id WHERE (a.after_sale_status = 1 or a.after_sale_status = 7) AND a.after_sale_type = 3 AND o.order_id IN
#{item}

sql.if:
SELECT
group_leader_name AS name,
count(group_id) AS value FROM t_order WHERE appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} AND pay_status in (1,2,3,4)
GROUP BY group_id ORDER BY value desc limit 5

SELECT
od.goods_name as name,
SUM(ord.pay_fee) as value FROM t_order ord left JOIN t_order_detail od on od.order_id = ord.order_id WHERE ord.appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} AND ord.pay_status in (1,2,3,4)
group by od.goods_id order by value desc limit 5

SELECT
u.wxuser_name as name,
SUM(ord.pay_fee) as value FROM t_order ord left JOIN t_wxuser u on u.wxuser_id = ord.wxuser_id WHERE ord.appmodel_id = #{appmodelId} AND ord.pay_status in (1,2,3,4)
GROUP BY ord.wxuser_id order by value desc limit 5
